availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George T. Irvine (Hickman County, KY, farmer )

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Parralee Maupin Irvine in Hickman County, Kentucky, on February 21, 1865. Student in Hickman County in 1850. Farmer in Clinton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 35A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Clinton, p. 525.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Hickman County Marriages, Film #000321385, p. 128-29.
